name: function-overloader
description: improve overloading functions and methods in js

scripts.prettier-changed: git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMRTU HEAD | grep ".*\.js$" | xargs prettier --config .prettierrc --write
scripts.coverage: nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require source-map-support --require babel-register --require babel-polyfill --require init.mocha.js --check-leaks --timeout 3000 'src/**/*.spec.js' && echo report available ./coverage/index.html
scripts.complexity: plato -r --eslint .eslintrc --exclude .spec.js -d report src && echo report available ./report/index.html
scripts.precommit: lint-staged && npm run build && git add dist/ && npm run linter && npm test
scripts.example: npm run build-server && node --require babel-register example/index.js

author: Krzysztof Sztompka <sztompka.krzysztof@gmail.com>
